advisors.name: Dr. Md. Mozammel Hoque
advisors.department: Department of Food Engineering & Tea Technology
advisors.biography: Dr. Md. Mozammel Hoque is a dedicated and active member of the Shahjalal University of Science and Technology. With a profound commitment to student excellence and research, they have guided numerous projects and initiatives within the department. Their expertise spans across multiple disciplines, fostering a culture of innovation and academic rigor.

contact.address: Room #300, Academic Building-E, SUST, Sylhet-3114, Bangladesh

advisors.name: Dr. Fatema Begum
advisors.biography: Dr. Fatema Begum has over 15 years of experience in artificial intelligence and machine learning. She has published numerous papers in international journals and conferences, and leads the AI research group at SUST.

contact.address: Room #405, Academic Building-E, SUST, Sylhet-3114, Bangladesh

advisors.name: Dr. Kamal Hossain
advisors.biography: Dr. Kamal Hossain specializes in computer networks and cybersecurity. He has worked on several national cybersecurity projects and coordinates the university's network security lab.

contact.address: Room #210, Academic Building-E, SUST, Sylhet-3114, Bangladesh

advisors.name: Dr. Shahida Khanom
advisors.biography: Dr. Shahida Khanom's research focuses on software engineering and human-computer interaction. She has received multiple teaching excellence awards and mentors undergraduate research projects.

contact.address: Room #315, Academic Building-E, SUST, Sylhet-3114, Bangladesh

advisors.name: Dr. Rafiqul Islam
advisors.biography: Dr. Rafiqul Islam is an expert in database systems and big data analytics. He has led several funded research projects and serves as the department's graduate program coordinator.

contact.address: Room #502, Academic Building-E, SUST, Sylhet-3114, Bangladesh

advisors.name: Dr. Nasrin Sultana
advisors.biography: Dr. Nasrin Sultana's research interests include natural language processing and computational linguistics. She is actively involved in developing Bengali language processing tools and resources.
